    rarity - Variable in class logic.cards.Card
    Rarity tier of the card (1â€“4).
    rarity - Variable in class logic.gamesystem.GameLogic.RewardInfo
    Rarity code: 1 = common 2 = rare 3 = legendary (or higher as used by callers)
    regen() - Method in class logic.character.Boss
    Increase 50 health to the Boss.
    remove(int) - Method in class logic.gamesystem.Hand
    Removes the card at the specified index.
    resetGame() - Method in class logic.gamesystem.GameController
    Resets all game progress, including: Miniboss clear count Deck contents Stage, enemy, and player state via GameLogic.resetGame() The deck is repopulated with the predefined starting cards.
    resetGame() - Method in class logic.gamesystem.GameLogic
    Resets the game state to the starting configuration: Clears game/stage end flags Sets current stage to 1 and spawns its enemy Creates a fresh Player instance
    RewardInfo(int, int, GearSlot) - Constructor for class logic.gamesystem.GameLogic.RewardInfo
    Constructs a RewardInfo instance.
    RewardView - Class in application
    RewardView presents the rewards screen shown after clearing a stage/miniboss.
    RewardView(Main) - Constructor for class application.RewardView
    Constructs a RewardView instance.
    runEnemyTurn() - Method in class logic.gamesystem.TurnManager
    Executes the enemy's turn and resolves resulting effects.
